title: Terminal capability detection and testing
description:
Add ralph-terminal-check command that detects terminal type and tests capabilities for optimal Ralph UI experience.

Detects:
- Terminal app ($TERM_PROGRAM: iTerm, Ghostty, Kitty, Warp, etc.)
- Color support (256, truecolor)
- Unicode/emoji rendering
- Kitty graphics protocol support
- GPU acceleration hints

Tests:
- ANSI escape sequence support
- Cursor positioning accuracy
- Live update rendering speed
- Box drawing characters

Recommendations:
- Suggest better terminal if current one is limited
- Note which UI features will/won't work

acceptanceCriteria.text: Test box drawing characters render correctly
Test live update speed (render loop benchmark)
Run automatically on first ralph startup (optional)
Save terminal profile to config for future reference
Warn if terminal has known issues with Ink/Gum
Commit: feat: US-110 terminal capability detection
Run CodeRabbit review - must pass (or create BUG if unfixable)
